title: User Account - Configure Email on Mobile Phone
description: A user needs help setting up their company email account on their personal mobile phone.

tasks.description: Check the client's policy to ensure personal devices are allowed to connect to company email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician confirms the client's policy allows for BYOD (Bring Your Own Device).

tasks.description: Guide the user to install the recommended email app (e.g., Outlook Mobile) and enter their credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user successfully adds their account.

tasks.description: Instruct the user to accept the mobile device management (MDM) policy prompt, which enforces security settings like a PIN code.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's device is enrolled in MDM, and email begins to sync.
